thread.title: Make Matty Matheson’s Epic Lobster Bisque
thread.title_full: Make Matty Matheson’s Epic Lobster Bisque

author: Munchies Staff
title: Make Matty Matheson’s Epic Lobster Bisque
text:
Make Matty Matheson’s Epic Lobster Bisque January 25, 2017 / 8:00 pm By Munchies Staff 
Sure, lobster bisque is a classic summer dish. 
But lobsters don’t give a shit. And neither does Dead Set on Life host Matty Matheson—those crazy sea bugs taste good all year long. 
With eight and a half cups of cream, more than a pound of butter, brandy, wine, and maple syrup, this take on the classic East Coast soup is just as well-suited for the winter months. 
It’s easy to make, but more rich and decadent than your go-to chicken noodle stuff (not that we have anything against the institution of chicken noodle soup). RECIPE: Lobster Bisque 
But sometimes you just want your lobsters to bathe in the finer things. They deserve it. And so do you.
